programme.title: Catch of the Day
programme.desc: On the eve of becoming a New York executive chef, Sophie returns home to help her family's flailing restaurant and runs into Cam, an old crush who makes her question everything.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy and Blanche contrive an answer to Rose's personal ad.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy begs Blanche to go out with her ex-husband, Stan, but becomes jealous when the couple hits it off; Sophia and Rose begin selling sandwiches on the Boardwalk but inadvertently make an enemy of another vendor.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Rose's daughter and Dorothy's son visit their mothers at the same time.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Rose, Blanche and Dorothy take a vacation at a resort that doesn't live up to its reputation.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: While Dorothy is laid off from teaching, she finds work at the same museum where Blanche goes to work.

programme.desc: Dorothy and Blanche contrive an answer to Rose's personal ad.

programme.title: Gilmore Girls
programme.desc: When she learns that the Independence Inn may be sold, Lorelai frets that her dream of opening an inn with Sookie may be doomed.

programme.title: Gilmore Girls
programme.desc: Jealous Dean monitors the rehearsals when Rory and Tristan are cast as Romeo and Juliet in the school play.

programme.title: Gilmore Girls
programme.desc: Rory does all she can to control the rivalry between Dean and Jess; Lorelai invites just about everyone to an elaborate feast.

programme.title: Gilmore Girls
programme.desc: Lorelai is angry when Rory tells Emily about their home's termite damage and Emily offers a repair loan.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Houston's premier real estate agent contacts Reba and Van for a meeting, exciting Reba but concerning Van that he will be her assistant.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Van builds a new home office in the garage so he and Reba can be more productive, but Reba has a difficult time juggling family and the additional workload.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Kyra moves back in with Reba, who catches her drinking; Brock and Barbra Jean confess that they let Kyra have an occasional beer in their house.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba and Van end their real estate partnership; Barbra Jean auditions to be the new weather girl at a local TV station.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba deals with Kyra and Cheyenne, who are at odds because Kyra feels her sister can not get enough of the family spotlight.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Kyra posts a video of Van on the Internet; Reba advises Brock to make a romantic gesture in order to save his marriage.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Sophia takes action when a depressed, gun-toting Santa Claus threatens to ruin Christmas for her and her housemates.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy feels sympathy for Stan when he tells her he's going to have open heart surgery; however, that sympathy fades when she learns of his many infidelities while they were married.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: The roommates swoon over a TV actor Patrick Vaughn who is appearing at their community theater.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy and Rose agree to baby-sit a group of children, but one set of parents fails to claim its child.

programme.title: The Magic of Ordinary Days
programme.desc: During World War II, the father of an unwed mother (Keri Russell) marries her off to a farmer (Skeet Ulrich) who will raise her baby as his own.

programme.title: Summer Villa
programme.desc: A novelist suffering from writer's block and a chef recovering from a bad review share a French villa for the summer.

programme.title: Gilmore Girls
programme.desc: Lorelai's retired father visits and drives her and Rory crazy critizing all aspects of their lives.

programme.desc: Jess outbids Dean to win a picnic lunch date with Rory at the annual Stars Hollow Picnic Basket Auction.

programme.title: Gilmore Girls
programme.desc: Christopher brings his new girlfriend (guest star Madchen Amick) to Stars Hollow, throwing Lorelai and Rory for a loop.

programme.title: Gilmore Girls
programme.desc: A suspicious Lorelai catches Jess in Rory's room and accuses him of stealing a bracelet; Luke impulsively decides to buy the building where he lives.

programme.desc: A woman tries to fulfill her grandmother's dying wish by delivering a strange letter.

programme.desc: When Hannah discovers the dead body of her competitor, she finds herself the top suspect of their murder.

programme.desc: Reba finds the perfect first home for Cheyenne and Van, but Cheyenne discovers that her high-school rival is selling it.

programme.desc: Kyra tells Reba and Brock that she is postponing college to tour with her band; Cheyenne and Van cannot agree on how to decorate their new house.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba drops by Cheyenne and Van's house unexpectedly; Barbra Jean has a meltdown during her weather report.

programme.title: Reba

programme.desc: Dorothy becomes romantically interested in Frank Leahy, a fellow teacher whom she later discovers is a priest.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: After attending a sorority reunion, Blanche considers having a face lift.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: One of Dorothy's pupils may face deportation, and she feels responsible.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Blanche announces that she is canceling a date with her latest boyfriend, because he does not meet her standards.

programme.title: Love's Portrait
programme.desc: Museum curator Lily finds a painting that's identical to her and searches for the artist in Ireland. While there, a charming man joins her on her quest and helps her rediscover love.

programme.desc: The owner of a bookstore butts heads with an architect who plans on renovating the neighborhood.

programme.title: Gilmore Girls
programme.desc: Lorelai and Emily spend a weekend at a health spa; unwelcome visitors spoil Rory's plans for an evening alone.

programme.title: Gilmore Girls
programme.desc: When Luke is overwhelmed with funeral arrangements for his dead uncle, Lorelai and Rory help out by working the counter at the diner.

programme.title: Gilmore Girls
programme.desc: When Rory asks her grandfather for help in creating a first-aid kit for teens, his pleasure at working on a new project prompts him to end his retirement.

programme.title: Gilmore Girls
programme.desc: When a car crash lands Rory in the hospital, Lorelai lashes out at Luke for putting the girl in danger.

programme.title: Sense, Sensibility & Snowmen
programme.desc: Christmas party planners Ella and her sister Marianne clash with client Edward, a not-so-jolly toy company CEO.

programme.title: Santa Tell Me
programme.desc: A design show host finds a letter from Santa promising to meet her true love, a man named Nick, by Christmas Eve. Meeting three Nicks complicates her search.
